WorkItem.ClosedComment: T8 issue is duplicate of Issue 13871
WorkItem.Description: Hi, the bonus for new tiers are not in the list of bonuses. This is a huge problem and brings rawr unusable for shadow priest, and proyect "shadows" over the calculations in haste/hit/crit . I think that could by a good idea a brief explanation about what is the stage of development on Shadow Priest. If is necesary to wait, no problem, but are noticiable to developers the issues on the Shadow Priest?

Comments.Message:
I added the T9 set bonuses as of today. Sorry about the delay. I also implemented the currently known changes for 3.2.2 as well.

I'm still struggling with T8 4 pc bonus, but I'm going to take a crack at it tomorrow. If it doesn't work out neatly I'll try to make it work out badly atleast :P
